name: Backpacking (UF Digital Worlds Institute)
description:
Backpacking

Created by Team Backpack

  • Michael O'Connell
  • Wesley Vannall
  • Rustin Durden
  • Andrew Ratz
  • Ryder Peppler

Step into the shoes of a boy in a small town who quickly becomes embroiled in a variety of mysteries around the neighborhood. Battle bullies, evil clowns, mimes, washing machines and more using a host of turn based special attacks.

Hours of fun and entertainment, become immersed in the zany world Team Backpack have created for you to explore.
